itunes:title: 340 - One Idea that Unlocks New Levels of Your Style, Reveals Your Builder Type & Gets You Back On Your Path
itunes:author: Co-Loop Podcast Network
itunes:summary:
There are so many obstacles on your creative path, and the biggest one? You! And the only self sabotage that ever really stops you is the one that we don’t know is self sabotage! In this episode I want to share a framework that you can use in 3 totally different ways to finally get out of your own way and start making the progress you know you’re capable of.

We will explore:
- What to do when you feel you’ll never be original enough
- A Trick for Getting More Useful Influence from your Heroes
- Find Your Creative Type So You Quit Comparing Yourself to Others
- A Method for Finding Your away Back Onto The Creative Path
itunes:subtitle:

itunes:keywords: creative pep talk, creativity, lego, art career, self sabotage, creative, creative career, motivation, inspiration, rebuild the world, imposter syndrome
